## Installation

```shell
npm install typedoc @mxssfd/typedoc-theme -D
```

## Usage

use script command

```shell
typedoc --plugin @mxssfd/typedoc-theme --theme my-theme
```

or

use `typedoc.json`

```json
{
  "$schema": "https://typedoc.org/schema.json",
  "plugin": ["@mxssfd/typedoc-theme"],
  "theme": "my-theme"
}
```
